posts.post_title: Looking for a few Helmar stamps - will pay cash or trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian C.
Hi, I'm looking for the following T332 Helmar stamps: Donlin, Evans, Jennings, McGraw, Mullin, Oakes, Paskert, Speaker, Suggs, Cy Young. Cash or trade is fine with me. Thanks!
